title: Book Signing
mainBlurb: Come join me for a book signing for the re-release of my first book on Saturday January 4th, 2025 at Barnes & Noble located at 15000 Potomac Town Place Suite 160 Woodbridge, VA 22191.
altBlurb: It starts at noon and runs till I'm done or the store closes, whichever comes first.

title: Launch of Eloquent Tales & Blues
mainBlurb: Where the art of storytelling is infused with music. On this channel, I'll be weaving captivating tales with original blues riffs, creating a space where words and melodies come together to evoke your emotions and spark your imagination. With original narratives and riffs, each episode will open a door to a new world.
altBlurb: Whether you're here for thought-provoking stories or a fun blues riff, Eloquent Tales And Blues offers something for everyone who appreciates the power of words and music. Join me on this journey of creativity, nostalgia, and soulful storytelling.
